actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of three Members to join with a like committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that Congress is ready to receive any communications that he may be pleased to make.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives to appoint a committee to join with a committee from the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has assembled and Congress is ready to receive communications.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of three Members to join with a like committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that Congress is ready to receive any communications that he may be pleased to make.
